A blend of energetic and uplifting tunes: The soundtrack to my life would include a mix of songs that energize and motivate me, such as "Eye of the Tiger" by Survivor, "Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey, and "Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars. These songs would reflect my can-do attitude and my unwavering belief in my abilities.

Melancholic ballads: To balance out the energetic tracks, my soundtrack would also include some melancholic ballads that allow me to reflect on my emotions and experiences. Examples include "Someone Like You" by Adele, "Hallelujah" by Jeff Buckley, and "Mad World" by Gary Jules. These songs would give me space to process my emotions and appreciate the beauty of life's moments, both good and bad.
